Package gram-builder

Gram Builder

Build valid syntax trees that represent data graphs.

Const reduce

  • reduce(relation?: Relation, pathlist: GramPath[], baseID?: string): GramPathlike
    • Defined in packages/gram-builder/src/gram-builder.ts:92

    Reduce a list of paths into a single path composed using the given relation.

    Parameters

    • Default value relation: Relation = "pair"

      the relation to apply to all sub-paths

    • pathlist: GramPath[]

      sub-paths to be paired

    • Optional baseID: string

      the baseID from which path expressions will derive new IDs

    Returns GramPathlike

Const seq

  • seq(paths: Children<GramPath>, id?: string, labels?: string[], record?: GramRecord): GramPathSeq
    • Defined in packages/gram-builder/src/gram-builder.ts:65

    Build a path sequence that represents a graph accumulating structure over time.

    Parameters

    • paths: Children<GramPath>

      sequence of paths through history

    • Optional id: string

      optional reference identifier. The "name" of this graph instance.

    • Optional labels: string[]

      optional labels

    • Optional record: GramRecord

      optional graph-level data

    Returns GramPathSeq
